Forms¶

The following documentation provides details about the classes for the various forms sent by the Personal Diary application.

class personal_diary.forms.CreateEntryForm(*args, **kwargs)¶

Form used for user to add a new entry to the diary by inputting a title and body. The title may only be at most 80 characters long, and the body may only be 300 characters long.

class personal_diary.forms.LoginForm(*args, **kwargs)¶

Form used for user to log into diary application. A user must enter a username and password.

class personal_diary.forms.SearchEntryForm(*args, **kwargs)¶

Search field to allow user to input keywords used to filter entries.

class personal_diary.forms.SignupForm(*args, **kwargs)¶

Form used for user to register a new User account. The user must input a unique username (max 15 characters), full name (max 30 characters), and a password (8-15 characters). They must also confirm their password by inputting it again and ensuring the input matches.

class personal_diary.forms.UpdateEntryForm(*args, **kwargs)¶

Form used for user to update an existing entry in the diary by editing a title and body. The title may only be at most 80 characters long, and the body may only be 300 characters long.
